Messages.NoReceiverWithGivenUuid: There are no receiver for module UUID of the incoming datagram
Messages.IncorrectAgent: An attempt was made to send to an agent with unknown tag
Messages.AnswerPayloadTooBig: An datagram was received with too big payload
Messages.TransceiverDisabled: An attempt was made to send a datagram when transceiver disabled
Messages.TooShortDatagramm: An datagram was received which length is less than default datagram header size
Messages.IncorrectDatagramm: An datagram was received with incorrect header data
Messages.DatagrammFromUnknownAgent: An datagram was received from unconfigured agent
Messages.CmdResendMaxAttempts: Maximum attempts to resend datagram when there in no reply
Messages.CantBindSocket: Failed to bind socket. Check local connection properties in the module configuration.
